mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Freeland, Allen J. Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Intermittent fever quotidian . Treatment: Quinine In full doses every 2 hours on the day of the chill. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
